verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How marvelous God's greatness! How glorious His might! To this the world bears witness in wonders day and night - in form of flow'r and snowflake, in morn's resplendent birth, in afterglow at even, in sky and sea and earth.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: The ocean's vast abysses in one grand psalm record the deep mysterious counsels and mercies of the Lord; the icy waves of winter are thund'ring on the strand; and grief's chill stream is guided by God's all-gracious hand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The starry hosts are singing thro' all the light-strewn sky of God's eternal temple and palace courts on high; when in these outer chambers such glory gilds the night, O, what transcendent brightness is God's eternal light!
